title: Amazing Three Bedroom on Michigan Ave! Pool, Rooftop, Gym, Doorman
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Spacious 3 Bedroom/2 Bath Available for August 1st!  151 N Michigan Ave, Chicago IL 60601    Millennium Park Plaza has complimentary amenities which include indoor heated pool, 24/7 fitness gym, yoga studio, business centers with computers and printing available.   》SIZE: 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath  》FIBER INTERNET:  COMPLIMENTARY 》DIRECT TV:  COMPLIMENTARY 》ELECTRIC:  TENANT PAYS 》HEATING/AC:  ELECTRIC 》PARKING: INDOOR VALET PARKING GARAGE $260/MONTH PER CAR    Apartment Features    The open floor plan allow plenty of room for entertaining, while still being right in the heart of downtown   Large windows, which means plenty of sunlight Full size stainless steel kitchen appliances Beautiful laminate wood floors in living room Tons of closet space Welcoming open kitchen layout  I look forward to helping you find your next home!  Heather Pozzi  Leasing Consultant  Millennium Park Living, Inc.   Prices are subject to change Equal housing opportunity
